mapper.select: SELECT a.*, b.type FROM wk_crm_role_field as a LEFT JOIN wk_crm_field as b on a.field_id = b.field_id WHERE a.role_id = #{roleId} and a.label = #{label}

SELECT a.field_name, max( a.mask_type ) AS mask_type, b.type FROM wk_crm_role_field as a JOIN wk_crm_field as b on a.field_id = b.field_id WHERE a.mask_type >= #{maskType} and a.label = #{label} GROUP BY field_name
